Detailed Description

A thin wrapper around a browfile, or a placeholder which allows users to choose "Other Mac Account" or "Choose File" instead of an existing browfile.

A browfile choice which wraps a browfile will have a non-nil browfile ivar and a nil selector.  A browfile choice which wraps a placeholder will have a nil browfile and a non-nil selector.

Member Function Documentation

+ (BrowfileChoice *) browfileChoiceWithBrowfile: (Browfile*)  browfile  

Returns a BrowfileChoice defined by a browfile.

Returns a BrowfileChoice even if browfile is nil. This is so that the localized "No Selection" placeholder can be returned for displayName and appear in the popup in this case.

Parameters:
browfile The browfile that is being wrapped
